content:
Hey! This is my first time using Zulip, so sorry if I'm doing something wrong :sweat_smile:

I'm looking to join tonight's Cross Team Collaboration Fun Times, but I'm not sure where to go. Can anyone point me in the right direction?

I think you can find the link on here in the first table https://rust-ctcft.github.io/ctcft/meetings/2021-06-21.html
The zoom meeting is linked in the google calendar entry thats linked there
Thanks! It is indeed there :smile:
